title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-4.14 - Information for design purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-4.14 - Information for design purposes

State Regulations

Each operator shall provide a means by which information
regarding the location of underground facilities can be obtained for design
purposes. Such means may include, but are not limited to: provision of maps, meetings, or marking in accordance with section
753-4.6
of this Subpart and shall
be performed within mutually agreed to timeframes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
753-4.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
